Application Deadline - Last Chance!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This is your final opportunity to apply to Step Forward, you have until this Sunday!
Make the wise decision about your future and apply now for our incredibly exciting school leavers’ programme beginning in August 2015!
Just as a reminder, as a Step Forward Associate, you'll get:
Invaluable experience with great employers £9000 paid salary Professional Development training to equip you with the essential skills Fantastic training and a nationally recognised qualification The advice and support of a trained mentor Professional network of contacts for the future
How do I apply?
Step Forward is a competitive programme and places are limited. To be considered for our next assessment event in Febraury half term, the deadline for submitting applications is Sunday 1st February. Apply with your unique application form Here.
Best wishes,
